level.text: 114.1 Before the Authority awards any contract that requires the approval ofhe District of Columbia Council in accordance with D.C. Official Code ยง-352.02, as such may be amended from time to time, and prior to the submissionf any such contract to the Council, the Board shall first approve the contracty a resolution passed by a majority of the Members.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 6180 (August 7, 2009); as amendedy Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10926 (November 19, 2010); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14, 2013).
